name: KeyedEncodingContainerProtocol
desc: A type that provides a view into an encoderâ€™s storage and is used to hold the encoded properties of an encodable type in a keyed manner.

items.name: var codingPath: [CodingKey]
items.desc: The path of coding keys taken to get to this point in encoding.

items.name: func encode(Bool, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(Float, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(UInt32, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(Int64, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode<T>(T, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(UInt, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(UInt64, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(UInt8, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(String, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(UInt16, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(Int, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(Double, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(Int8, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(Int32, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encode(Int16, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key.

items.name: func encodeConditional<T>(T, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes a reference to the given object only if it is encoded unconditionally elsewhere in the payload (previously, or in the future).

items.name: func encodeIfPresent(String?, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.name: func encodeIfPresent(Bool?, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.name: func encodeIfPresent(Double?, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.name: func encodeIfPresent(Float?, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.name: func encodeIfPresent(Int?, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.name: func encodeIfPresent(UInt?, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.name: func encodeIfPresent(Int64?, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.name: func encodeIfPresent(UInt8?, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.name: func encodeIfPresent(UInt16?, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.name: func encodeIfPresent(UInt32?, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.name: func encodeIfPresent(UInt64?, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.name: func encodeIfPresent<T>(T?, forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes the given value for the given key if it is not nil.

items.name: func encodeNil(forKey: Self.Key)
items.desc: Encodes a null value for the given key.

items.name: func nestedContainer<NestedKey>(keyedBy: NestedKey.Type, forKey: Self.Key) -> KeyedEncodingContainer<NestedKey>
items.desc: Stores a keyed encoding container for the given key and returns it.

items.name: func nestedUnkeyedContainer(forKey: Self.Key) -> UnkeyedEncodingContainer
items.desc: Stores an unkeyed encoding container for the given key and returns it.

items.name: func superEncoder() -> Encoder
items.desc: Stores a new nested container for the default super key and returns a new encoder instance for encoding super into that container.

items.name: func superEncoder(forKey: Self.Key) -> Encoder
items.desc: Stores a new nested container for the given key and returns a new encoder instance for encoding super into that container.
